dcterms:creator: Y. LeCun
dcterms:description: A dataset of handwritten digits used for training various image processing systems. It consists of 60,000 training images and 10,000 testing images of 28x28 pixel grayscale images of handwritten digits.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: H. Xiao
K. Rasul
R. Vollgraf
dcterms:description: A dataset of fashion items, consisting of 60,000 training images and 10,000 testing images, designed to serve as a drop-in replacement for the MNIST dataset for benchmarking machine learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: Fashion-MNIST
